desc_corta: Coloring games for adults. Paint by number pixel art pictures and relax!

desc_larga:
ibis Paint X is a popular and versatile drawing app downloaded more than 460 million times in total as a series, which provides over 47000 brushes, over 27000 materials, over 2100 fonts, 84 filters, 46 screentones, 27 blending modes, recording drawing processes, stroke stabilization feature, various ruler features such as radial line rulers or symmetry rulers, clipping mask features, Vector tool, Animation feature, and AI Disturbance Packed with professional features.

*YouTube channel
Many tutorial videos on ibis Paint are uploaded to our YouTube channel.
Subscribe it!
https://youtube.com/ibisPaint

*Concept/Features
- A Highly functional and professional features surpassing that of desktop drawing apps.
- Smooth and comfortable drawing experience realized by OpenGL technology.
- Recording your drawing process as a video.
- SNS feature where you can learn drawing techniques from other users' drawing process videos.

*Features
ibis Paint has high functionality as a drawing app along with features of sharing drawing processes with other users.

[Brush Features]
- Smooth drawing at up to 60 fps.
- Over 47000 kinds of brushes including dip pens, felt tip pens, digital pens, air brushes, fan brushes, flat brushes, pencils, oil brushes, charcoal brushes, crayons and stamps.

[Layer Features]
- You can add layers as many as you need with no limit.
- Layer parameters that can be set to each layers individually such as layer opacity, alpha blending, adding, subtracting, and multiplying.
- A handy clipping feature for clipping images, etc.
- Various layer commands such as layer duplication, import from the photo library, horizontal inversion, vertical inversion, layer rotation, layer moving, and zooming in/out.
- A feature for setting layer names to distinguish different layers.

[Manga Features]
- Advanced text tool function featuring Vertical, Horizontal, Stroke, Font select, and Multiple text functions.

*About ibis Paint purchase plan
The following purchase plans are available for ibis Paint:
- ibis Paint X (free version)
- ibis Paint (paid version)
- Remove Ads Add-on
- Prime Membership (Monthly plan / Yearly plan)
There is no difference in features other than the presence or absence of advertisements for the paid version and the free version.
If you purchase the Remove Ads Add-on, the ads will not be displayed and there will be no difference from the paid version of ibis Paint.
In order to use more advanced functions, the following Prime Membership (Monthly plan / Yearly plan) contracts are required.

[Prime Membership]
A prime member can use the prime features. Only for the initial time you can use the 7 days or the 30 days free trial.  Prime membership entitles you to the following features.
- 20GB of cloud storage capacity

- Gradation Map filter
- Levels Adjustment filter
- Prime Adjustment Layers
- Surrounding Fill„ÉªSurrounding Eraser
- AI Disturbance
- Artwork folder feature
- Import original brush patterns
- Remove watermark from videos
- No advertisements displayed
- Plus many other features exclusive to Prime Membership!
(*1) You can try it for free for up to 1 hour per day.
* After you become a Prime Membership with a free trial, renewal fee will be charged automatically unless you cancel your Prime Membership at least 24 hours before the end of the free trial period.
* We will add premium features in future, please look out for them.

*On Data Collection
- Only when you are using or going to use SonarPen, the app collects audio signal from microphone. The collected data is only used for communication with SonarPen, and is never saved nor sent to anywhere.

desc_corta: Unleash Your Creativity in an Infinite Cube World!

Have you ever dreamed of holding an entire world in your hands? üéÆ TWO MODES ‚Äì TWO WAYS TO PLAY

‚ö° FEATURE HIGHLIGHTS

üåü WHY YOU‚ÄôLL LOVE IT

Perfect for creative builders and survival adventurers alike.

desc_corta: Raft survival game you have never played before. Build the biggest raft ever!
desc_larga:
Welcome to the raft, survivor! Ready to test your survival skills in the vast expanses of the ocean?

Raft Survival: Ocean Nomad ‚Äì is an adventure survival game on a raft in the ocean. Fight enemies in the ocean, craft all kinds of items and weapons, explore new territories and uninhabited islands.
Many adventures are waiting for you: survival on the island, exploration of the ocean by boat, fishing and much more. You will have to try hard to survive in the post-apocalypse: hunting for sharks and extracting resources from the ocean, building and improving the Raft and creating armor to protect against the dangers of the ocean.

Features of our game:

‚òÜ Hundreds of weapons and items;
‚òÜ Open world exploration;
‚òÜ Realistic 3D HD - graphics;
‚òÜ Survival on islands;
‚òÜ Improved raft building.

Tips for apocalypse survival:

üåä Catch items and resources with you hook

Chests and barrels floating around always contain vital resources for survival in the sea, and wreckages are really good material for raft building in ocean games. You might even find items, tools and weapons for defense of the raft, so keep on throwing the hook!

üî´ Craft weapons and armor

A prey can easily change the rules and become a hunter in shark games. Make a hard choice among hundreds of guns, two-handed blade weapons and armor parts to defend you floating base and hunt sharks. Craft a perfect arsenal and always be ready for the battle.

‚õµÔ∏è Defend your raft

Be ready to evolve and fight for survival in the sea with a double effort, now that you‚Äôve got one more problem to deal with. No man can tame a shark and there‚Äôs nowhere to escape, so prepare for shooting and swinging all night and day long!

üî® Build and upgrade

Pay attention to the condition of your raft on the water in survival RPG games in the ocean. It‚Äôs not enough to tie together a couple of wooden planks without a roof or even walls to feel safe. Be creative and expand the raft in height and width, because the only limit for building in survival simulator games is your imagination. There‚Äôs also a lot of upgrades for fishing, storage space extension, that you can improve the floating shelter with to help you survive in the ocean.

 Explore the ocean

Have you ever wondered if there is a lost land with forests, jungle and animals in this endless ocean? An awesome feature of our island survival games is now implemented in this one. Don‚Äôt sit idle ‚Äî dare to explore the ocean and islands around. What do they hide: horror or glory, medieval royale treasures or wild tigers and scary dinosaurs from the jurassic age or even an old airplane wreckage? What's more you can find resources, upgrades for the raft and other items on the islands. You won‚Äôt need a ship or an ark to sail to them in shark games ‚Äî a simple boat will do, and let the stars be your guide.

üåã Learn the story of the apocalypse

An unknown devastating cataclysm turned the world into an endless ocean and last survivors are locked on scattered islands like in prison, dreaming of finding their home. The quest of our raft game is to find them and discover the truth of what happened, find other people who could survive and join them.

 Survive on a raft

Our offline survival simulator game is full of evolved enemies, good survival items and other features that will surprise everybody. Embark on an epic survival adventure with the Raft Survival: Ocean Nomad game. Play with no wifi or internet connection, last as many days as you can and share the results online with friends!

Jump into an endless block world full of adventure, creativity, and multiplayer fun ‚Äî perfect for fans of building and crafting games.

Survival and Exploration

Creative Building
Love designing? Then Creative Mode is your playground. Use unlimited blocks to build, design, and decorate everything from cozy homes to futuristic cities. Express yourself in this immersive building and creation world where imagination has no limits.

Multiplayer World
Join thousands of players online in a shared multicraft adventure. Explore other players‚Äô lands, visit creative builds, and team up for epic projects. Worldcraft fans will love the freedom to create, connect, and explore in real time.

Clans, Trade, and Teleports
Form clans, trade valuable items, and teleport instantly across huge lands. Whether you enjoy my craft or primal-style gameplay, Planet Craft gives you the power to build, explore, and cooperate with friends.

Pets and Companions 
Tame horses, cats, and dogs to accompany you on your mini block 3D journeys. These loyal friends help you survive, explore, and collect rare items on your adventures.

Private Worlds and Custom Rules 
Create your own private servers and set custom rules. Build peaceful, creative zones or test your skills in extreme survival challenges. Your world, your way.

Mini Games and Quests 
Expand your fun with mini games like TNT Run, Spleef, Hide and Seek, and Hunger Games. Complete daily quests, earn rewards, and unlock rare block and skin.

desc_corta: Fun and interactive life story and life simulation game. Family life & my life!
desc_larga:
Are you bored with so-called life simulation games in which the choices you make have no point? Then give Life Choices a try! From the creators of Brain Test Tricky Puzzles, Brain Test 2 Tricky Stories and Who Is? Tricky Riddles! A little bit life, a little bit choices. This game is more about the decisions.

Our life growing game is a bit life simulator game. You navigate the twists and turns of your very own life story, making hard choices that shape your journey from birth to adulthood. With its richly interactive stories and chapters, life story game offers a unique blend of family life and life game in every episode. 

Unicoville needs your help as the town needs repairs and restoration. Bring new people to the town, play their lives, complete objectives and see the town reborn before your eyes. Life simulator game is a free offline game. My life is a game! Play adorable angels and devils. It is a little bit simulator but mostly a story of heaven and hell when you come first to life.

Become anyone and express yourself freely in this game of life simulation. Create dozens of characters, live their whole life from birth to death, and make difficult choices along the way. Live all the bits of my life. Hell heaven game is one of the best games in the world.

Life Choices is a fun, interactive and interesting life simulation game filled with surprises. There are more than 1000 choices for you to make as you shape your characters‚Äô lives and decide their fates. Start from the beginning of life and grow into an old person. Life game and judgment day features.

Each decision in this life sim influences your personal narrative, inviting you to explore the depth of life games through engaging chapters and episodes in this family life simulator. 

BUILD YOUR SKILLS!
Work on your intelligence, strength and art as you fight the hardships of life. Each choice affects your skills and your skills affect the outcome of your choices. If you like simulator games and story games, this game is very adorable.

BUILD A TOWN!
Rebuild the houses of Unicoville and see the town flourish again. Pick from different house variations and establish your style. Enjoy the gorgeous 3D rendered town graphics. Choose your life and make your decision on your life. angel and devil games in an adorable life simulator.

BUILD A HOUSE!
Start with a small house and unlock bigger ones as you play. Customize dozens of rooms to your liking and pick furniture from a vast library of selections. All objects are beautifully rendered in 3D.

CHOOSE A JOB!
There are several jobs and career paths to choose from. Work as a doctor, police, scientist, president, mafioso or cook. You can even go into crazy careers and become a superhero or a monarch. If you don‚Äôt like working, you can live as unemployed and earn money through some side hustles.

BECOME GOOD or EVIL!
This game is not a stairway to heaven. You are not forced to be a good person. You can choose to become evil as well. Fight your way up into the top spots at Karma Leaderboards as someone who is good or evil.

PLAY STORY LIVES!
Life Choices allows you to create your own unique characters, but you can also play the story characters and help them achieve their life goals. Help Meredith to become an astronaut, or help Jeff to take his revenge. Live all the bits of life with interesting stories.

Features:
‚óè Free to download, free to play, and free to enjoy. No hidden fees.
‚óè More than 1000 choices to make.
‚óè Dozens of different character sets.
‚óè Family friendly gameplay with no explicit content.
‚óè Customize the town to your liking. Design your own houses.
‚óè Customize your house with lots of options.
‚óè Play the story lives filled with exciting events.
‚óè Humorous situations and surprising events.
‚óè Fight for the Karma Leaderboards.
‚óè Find your romance.
‚óè Dozens of different endings.
‚óè Addictive and relaxing gameplay.
‚óè Play without the internet.
‚óè Simple and highly addictive game play.
‚óè Play offline.

Have fun!

desc_corta: Welcome to an island full of adventure !!
desc_larga:
Welcome to an island full of adventure ‚Ä¶ Play in the sea with dolphins or visit the monkeys in the jungle!! There are wonderful animals hiding near the waterfall ‚Ä¶ and a magical wedding on top of the mountain !!


Yasa Pets Island is totally FREE to play !! 


Features include:


* Discover a secret island full of places to explore!!
* Pack your backpacks and make new friends at the island school!!
* Have lunch with friends in the school canteen!!
* Swim with dolphins and other beautiful sea creatures!!
* Go diving in the coral to collect beautiful shells!!
* Meet all the amazing animals in the jungle!!
* Celebrate a birthday in the hot tub!!
* The local hospital is where babies are born!!
* Feed the monkeys playing in the jungle!!
* Spend the day on the beach playing in the sand!!
* There is a wedding taking place at the top of the mountain!!


**** Remember to connect to the internet to collect the stars ****


WEDDING : Collect the stars to visit the top of the mountain where a wedding is about to take place! Dress up the bride and the groom for their special day! Take wedding photos of the guests with beautiful views of the island in the background!!


SCHOOL : The school on the island is no ordinary classroom ‚Ä¶ it‚Äôs in a special hut over the water!! Learn all about the beautiful birds on the island as you feed them!  Get a new backpack and have lunch with friends in the canteen!


WATERFALL : The jungle animals are so cute but they are a little shy! The best place to see them is when they come out to take a drink of water at the waterfall ‚Ä¶ you could meet a lion, a tiger or even an elephant !!  


JUNGLE HOSPITAL : Work as a doctor in the hospital or go to visit a friend who is a patient. The nurse will look after anyone who is feeling unwell !! This is where baby bunnies, kittens and puppies are born !!


MONKEY TREE : The naughtiest animals on the island like to play in the biggest tree in the jungle, so they are easy to find! Be careful they don‚Äôt grab your camera and run up to the top of the tree!! They love to eat bananas.


BEACH : Relax on the sand eating ice cream with friends. Try on a new swimsuit in the changing room then build a sand castle. It‚Äôs very sunny, so don‚Äôt forget to put on sunscreen.


SEA : Swim with dolphins and baby seals or feed a hungry octopus. Go diving to collect beautiful shells hidden in the coral! And don‚Äôt forget to visit the snorkelling hut to change your oxygen tank before it runs out!


BEACH HOUSE : There‚Äôs a beach house right on the sand where you can throw a barbecue for friends or celebrate a birthday party in the hot tub!!


***


Enjoy playing Yasa Pets Island? Leave us a review, we love hearing from you.

Privacy is an issue that we take very seriously. To learn more, please read our privacy policy : https://www.yasapets.com/privacy-policy/

World Building Craft is #1 sandbox block world crafting simulator. If you can imagine it, you can build it!

The 3D random generated open world is composed of rough 3D blocks for you to pick up and place everywhere. You can use a variety of different pixel cubes to build anything from simplest houses to magnificent wonders! Big Ben, Cristo Redentor, Eiffel Tower are all in your palm now!

Game Features:
- Craft anything you like with hundreds of predesigned buildings
- Open world sandbox game where no specific goals are required to accomplish
- Unlimited resource to build with plus the ability to fly
- Building, exploration, resource gathering, craft and many other activities

desc_corta: Visit the coolest building in the world and explore 7 floors of fun!
desc_larga:
The Puppies are here !!! Visit the coolest building in the world and explore 7 floors of fun! Choose an apartment and meet the neighbours! Spend the day at the office then relax in the rooftop pool!


Yasa Pets Tower is totally FREE to play !! 


Features include:


* ADORABLE PUPPIES !!! Meet the new Puppies that have joined Yasa Pets!! 
* Visit a skyscraper full of fun! There are 7 floors to explore!
* Choose which apartment to stay in ‚Ä¶ there are 4 to choose from!!
* Have a meeting in the office and get promoted to boss!
* Drop off the kids at daycare!
* Get money at the bank or start a new job as a bank manager!
* Hang out with friends at the coffee shop ‚Ä¶ or take your coffee to go!!
* Pick up fresh vegetables and beautiful flowers in the park!
* Go shopping and try on all the new fashions! 
* Have an amazing meal at the sushi bar ‚Ä¶ or try delicious Chinese dumplings!
* Celebrate Christmas at the office and exchange gifts!
* Unlock the ROOFTOP POOL by collecting STARS !!!!
* Then party on the roof with all your friends!


**** Remember to connect to the internet to collect the stars ****


ENTRANCE : Enter the lobby and find out all about the tower from the receptionist! Hang out in the coffee shop where they have delicious treats and coffees!


1ST FLOOR : The vegetable market has the freshest fruit and vegetables ‚Ä¶ drop into the bank if you need extra cash from the machine ‚Ä¶ while you‚Äôre there why not talk to the bank manager about opening a new account? Or take a job behind the counter ‚Ä¶ they‚Äôre hiring !!!


2nd FLOOR : Time to go to work !! Celebrate all the hard work with an office party!! Have lunch with other staff in the canteen !! Get promoted to boss and sit in the luxurious corner office !! At Christmas the whole floor is decorated to celebrate the holidays !!


3rd FLOOR : Go shopping for the most fashionable outfits !! Choose something smart for the office or elegant for a romantic dinner at the restaurant ‚Ä¶ there are stylish accessories like handbags and sunglasses!!


DAYCARE : Drop off the kids at daycare ‚Ä¶ they love playing with their friends and feeding the parrot ! After lunch they get tired and the teacher will put them to bed for a nap! 


4th FLOOR : Time to decide between two amazing restaurants !!!! The Japanese restaurant has an incredible sushi bar and serves delicious bowls of noodle soup ‚Ä¶ while at the Chinese restaurant enjoy fantastic fried rice and yummy dumplings and even birthday cake !!


5th FLOOR APARTMENT 1 : This is a dream home for anyone who loves pink!! Enjoy soaking in the huge bathtub with a view over the city then play dress up with all the outfits in the huge closet. Hang out with friends in the unicorn room !!!


5th FLOOR APARTMENT 2 : A sporty person‚Äôs perfect home ‚Ä¶ this apartment is full of trophies and sports equipment. Hang out with friends in the unique football room then play video games!! There are lots of sports outfits to try on before going out!!


6th FLOOR APARTMENT 1 : This stylish and modern apartment is perfect for a young family to welcome a new baby. Enjoy amazing views of the city from the terrace after a hard day in the office.


6th FLOOR APARTMENT 2 : A luxury home with a classic style ‚Ä¶ enjoy having milk and cookies by the fireplace or have friends over for dinner. The baby sleeps soundly next to it‚Äôs parents bed in this beautiful family home.‚Ä®


7th FLOOR : Visit the exclusive members club filled with celebrities on the roof !!! After being photographed on arrival change into a bathing suit and hang out by the pool with friends !! Then go to a party with a DJ and dance the night away!


***

Enjoy playing Yasa Pets Tower? Leave us a review, we love hearing from you.

Privacy is an issue that we take very seriously. To learn more, please read our privacy policy : https://www.yasapets.com/privacy-policy/

desc_corta: Explore, craft, and escape the island in this retro survival RPG adventure!
desc_larga:
Remastered Version!
Embark on an epic journey with Survival RPG: Lost Treasure, a free 2D retro role-playing game where survival, crafting, and adventure meet in a nostalgic pixel art world. Whether you're a fan of survival games or classic RPGs, this game will take you on an immersive offline adventure.

Story:
Lost and stranded on a mysterious island, you narrowly escape your sinking ship. Now, you must survive, explore dungeons, craft tools, and forage for items to make your way off the island. Can you find the legendary lost treasure and return home? Or will the island‚Äôs secrets trap you forever?

Game Features:

Explore multiple islands and mysterious dungeons.
Craft over 40 tools and items to help you in your journey.
Find over 70 unique items hidden across the islands.
Fight monsters and survive dangerous environments.
Use tools like an axe and shovel to cut trees and dig your way through.
Solve puzzles and unlock hidden treasures.
Retro 2D pixel art style, bringing back the charm of classic old-school RPGs.
Play offline: No internet connection needed.

Why Play Survival RPG? Whether you're a fan of crafting RPGs, offline RPGs, or retro survival games, this game offers hours of fun and challenging gameplay. With puzzles to solve, dungeons to explore, and treasures to find, there's never a dull moment. Best of all, it's completely free to play!

desc_corta: Let's explore princess castle. a dollhouse game adventure with little princess.
desc_larga:
Jibi Land Princess Castle is a pretend-play dollhouse game that features an open-ended style of play. This allows you to explore a world filled with magic and fantasy. In this magical land, you will find numerous surprises and meet amazing characters such as little princesses, charming princes, dragons, unicorns, fairy, and many other cute pets. If you are a fan of dollhouses, this is a game you won't want to miss.

This is the first game in the Jibi Land series with a Princess Castle theme.

Inside the princess' castle, you'll find lots of activities to do, whether it's exploring the castle, solving puzzles, hunting treasure, or dressing up the princess. Make up and go out on a date with the prince, then cook delicious food and drinks. Come to a party at the private pool or enjoy with lots of cute pets, including cats, dogs, horses, and go in search of the little unicorn in the mysterious land. All in all, you can choose to play freely. There are no rules; anything is possible in this land, depending on your imagination.

How to play:
Our gameplay is like pretend play or a dollhouse. There are no rules to play. Our game is an independent space that allows children to fully unleash their imagination. Just choose a favorite character, like my princess, and use your imagination to create your own story

What will the story in this castle be like next?
You decide.

Game features:
- 9 fantastic dollhouse scenes, with tons of secrets and treasure puzzles to surprise you in this magic castle.
- Many cute characters, such as little princess, handsome prince, king, queen, maid, and chef, letting you create your own story freely.
- More than 100 animal characters for you to raise and take care of, such as little unicorn, little fairy, mischievous cat, and cute dog.
- Many gorgeous princess dresses to let you dress up the princess.
- Dragon eggs and unicorn eggs waiting for you to find and hatch.
- Some pets can grow, such as horse, unicorn, dragon. Take care of them and watch them grow.
- More than 100 food and beverage menus for you to cook. Let's cook delicious food for my princess.
- A magic magnifying glass system that will help you find secret items and solve puzzles.
- Sticker system for you to find and collect over 100 types.

New update:
- The underground secret room : encounter over 50 mysterious fairy, and discover ancient hidden treasures waiting to be found.
- New map system : Allows you to roam the world freely, explore new locations, and embark on adventures in the magic world of Jibi Land.

Advice for parents:
This game is designed for children between the ages of 6-12, so they can be played by themselves or with friends. Children under 6 years of age should be accompanied by a parent.

We believe in the power of pretend play, as it will help develop children's imagination and creativity. So we strive to develop an independent space in the format of a dollhouse where children can play and enjoy using their imagination. And we would appreciate it if parents can take the time to join this game with your child. Because that means our games can play a part in building a good relationship within your family. 

We hope you enjoy playing this game.

desc_corta: Interactive story with Educational Games and Tasks for IQ and memory training
desc_larga:
An interactive story with educational tasks and mini-games for kids 6-9 years old.
 

The two main characters, Cat and Dog, look for the lost Fairy, and travel into various worlds in their magic machine. In their travels they get to know gnomes, elves, dragons in a dungeon, aliens on a distant planet and dive deep into the ocean.

The plot alternates with logic tasks. To help the characters progress in the story, the user solves the tasks and trains their attention, memory, logic, spatial intelligence and other brain functions.

The story consists of 5 chapters. There is also a list of 14 separate mini-games, each with 4 levels of difficulty.

The app was designed by a child psychologist and teacher. 

Logic tasks in the story:
Detect a pattern in the sequence,
Mazes,
Jigsaw puzzles,
Guess which envelope was made from which piece of paper,
Position flowers in a bunch according to a given rule,
Sudoku, and more.

Tasks to train attention:
Pick the correct shadow of the dragon,
Find two similar sea stars,
Find a fish which is missing a match,
Pick the correct patch,
Count all numbers in ascending/descending order,
Find all aliens, and others.

Tasks for memory-training:
Memorize positions of stars on the ancient map,
Recall what the friends have taken with them,
Recall the favorite fruit of each elf, and more.

The app supports 15 languages: English, Russian, German, French, Spanish, Portuguese, Italian, Dutch, Japanese, Swedish, Danish, Norwegian, Polish, Czech, and Turkish.

desc_corta: Bake the most impressive princess cake to impress all the guests.
desc_larga:
Surprise the guests at the royal ball with this Princess cake baking game in which you will learn how to prepare one of the most awesome desserts they have ever tasted. The start will consist of you preparing the batter. This way you will have to use all the best ingredients at your disposal in order to ensure that the quality is nothing less than perfect. 

Pour the sugar and the baking powder, together with the flour into a bowl and then crack open some eggs. Separate the yolks from the whites and proceed to add more ingredients together. You will be needing some butter to give it some smoothness to the taste, some salt to balance the sweetness and also a little bit of cocoa powder. 

Take the mixer and blend all of these together until there are no more lumps left and everything is homogenized. If you do this step right, the batter will cook evenly and you will have plenty of fun decorating it afterwards as you do not have to repair any imperfections. Pour the batter into the cooking tray and then you will place that into the oven to bake for just a few seconds, as time flies by when you are having fun. 

Once the base is complete, you will then move to the decorating station where you will have lots of icings and other treats and sprinkles that can go on top. For this reason, you will place each princess on the top of the cake and then begin to make them look amazing. Choose the right color for the cake icing, the perfect match for it on the sides as well, add some lollipops and all sorts of decorative accents that will make the cake look even more special. 

There are lots of things that will impress you during the time you will play, such as:
-Hands on baking experience
-Plenty of steps to each baking process
-Accurate progression
-Freedom to decorate the cake to your liking
-Colorful and magical environment
-Beautiful soundtrack to set the fantasy mood
-Instructions that clearly remind you what to do

Make a cake and decorate the room with balloons and accessories! Baby penguin is so happy now! Look - a polar bear sells some colorful ice cream! Choose among tons of flavors, toppings and sprinkles! Mermaid Mei lives in The Asian Sea with her friends: a crab and a shark! Little crabby is sad because his home is dirty and full of rubbish from The Land. Let‚Äôs help the crab clean up his once beautiful underwater place. The shark is hungry and wants a burger! Prepare the yummiest meal: choose needed ingredients and put them in the right order! Oh no, Mei‚Äôs hair is such a mess! Help her make it pretty again and create the most beautiful ocean princess tiara!

Let‚Äôs help the ocean friends clean up and make everything nice and shiny again! Remove trash and rescue a pink dolphin from chains, nets and plastic! Clean up and decorate Kiara‚Äôs house! The cutest baby octopus was drawing and its little tentacles got tangled and covered in paint! Let‚Äôs help the underwater cutie! Now, meet the most beautiful fish in The African Sea! desc_corta: New exciting ice princess, vampire & hula girl makeover adventures in Hollywood!
desc_larga:

Serena, Naomi and Bella are casting for their dream movies and they need your help to get ready. Turn lovely Naomi into a dancing Hawaiian princess and make her the most beautiful hula girl outfit. desc_corta: Join in this adventure game and see how is like to own a unicorn of yours.
desc_larga: The best way you could understand a horse caretaker and the responsibilities you are confronting with during the process is to get in this unicorn game and learn on your own skin the proper activities that need to be done in order to have a happy and healthy horse. And exactly how you could accomplish that? It's simple, you just have to follow the game's challenges and make sure each one of them is fulfilled so your money and experience points will raise. Yes, you heard that right, you are able to earn some coins in this game to buy anything you might like to add for your little unicorn. There are also some icons that will show you the actual health condition and the good state of his mind. His happiness is in your hands and the first thing you are going to do while you are playing with this unicorn is to clean his stable from the dirt that accumulated during the time. Once his home is all cleaned up his turn comes too and you must use all those tools to give him a real pamper. Because you care of him you'll take him next to the farrier to care his hooves and you will go through a whole process to chance them, pay attention. You even have a harvest game where you need to collect in  a bucket apples and water to be able to provide a good healthy meal. Next you have to unlock the upcoming level and if you would like to decorate his home, dress him up with nice accessories, take him to the doctor for a full control, offering him a facial spa treatment and also a make up. There are also interactive games integrated and as you can see the complexity of the game will make you wanna play it as much as possible. And for that we would want to reward you with some daily prizes like the gifts boxes and the spin wheel where you can spin your luck. Besides those you have some funny mini games and an exciting horse race where you could win more money. Your goal is to earn experience as a unicorn caretaker and to have fun trying to fulfill the needs of this cute animal. This pony game is everything you wished for and even more, the features are exorbitant and the way graphics managed to combine with the thematic is amazing.

desc_larga:
Kids love fun coloring games, and this Coloring Game is one of the best free coloring book and painting apps for children!

Coloring Games is filled with fun, colorful, and creative drawing and painting tools that help kids of all ages enjoy creating art on your mobile device. There are multiple modes the whole family can enjoy, including paint by numbers, color by numbers, doodling modes, and free coloring books of all types. Whether your kid is a toddler or a preschooler, they're bound to have fun with this free coloring game!

Coloring Games was built specifically for children. It has an easy to understand interface kids as young as one year old can use. They'll have fun using the drawing, painting, and learning games at their disposal, while parents can watch the looks of joy on their faces as they color in the pages with a wide variety of paints.

There are a ton of coloring mini-games to play in Coloring Games, including:

1. Fun Paint - Tap to fill in the blank coloring book pages with a dozen bright and fun colors!

2. Color Fill - Use a wider variety of colors and options to paint the pictures, including stickers, glitter, crayons, and cute patterns.

3. Drawing - Draw on a blank slate with a full palette of colors ready to go.

4. Glow Pen - Paint with neon colors on a dark background. A fun way to create unique artwork!

5. Number Paint - Color-by-numbers to fill in an amazing picture, one paint shade at a time!

Coloring Games comes with a number of features that help adults monitor their child's progress. You can easily add profiles for each child, customize settings to make color activities easier or harder and more. Best of all, the coloring game is completely FREE to play. There are no ads, no in-app purchases, and no paywalls to fight with, just tons of safe, educational fun for kids.

Preschoolers, toddlers, families, and boys and girls of all ages will love the simple but engaging fun of Coloring Games. It's easy to start coloring with just a few taps on the screen, and maybe your child will create a miniature masterpiece!

Note to parents:
When creating this game, our goal was to craft a unique and fun experience perfectly designed for children. We're parents ourselves, and we know how ads and paywalls can get in the way of families enjoying playtime together.

Coloring Games is completely free. You won't find any in-app purchases or third party advertisements, just a great coloring book app you can play with your children. We don't want our kids consuming hundreds of ads while they learn, and we think other parents agree with that, as well!

Thank you for taking the time to experience fun learning and coloring apps with your children. Spread the word so more parents can share wholesome entertainment with their families, too!

Best wishes from the parents at RV AppStudios

desc_corta: A fun cartoon jigsaw puzzle game with cartoon animals from all around the world!
desc_larga:
A fun and cute Animal Cartoon Jigsaw Puzzle Game for kids, preschool toddlers, both boys and girls. Amazing jigsaw puzzles with wild animals from all around the world. This kids puzzle game for children will definitely bring laughter and joy to all kids around the world your kids. If you kids enjoy solving puzzles the will love this jigsaw puzzle.

Really useful for the little ones. Close in on the correct place and the piece will snap into the right position. 

Each puzzle features a different beautiful scene drawn by a professional cartoon artist, and a unique interactive reward when the jigsaw puzzle is completed. 

With 9 (!) different difficulty puzzle sizes this app really range from easy to challenging. Learn as you go, start with small puzzles and increase difficulty as you go. 

Toggle the background of the puzzle to make it even more challenging.

All outgoing links and the single in-app purchase are protected (changed through settings) by parent gate. 

FEATURES

- Play over 20 challenging and fun puzzles!
- Many different sceneries with wild animals from all around the world
- Enjoy amazing and high quality graphics from professional cartoon designers
- Challenge yourself with 9 different puzzle sizes: 6, 9, 12, 16, 20, 30, 56, 72 and 100 pieces and 3 different puzzle backgrounds
- Fun rewards after each completed puzzle
- Easy and intuitive gameplay suitable for children with just the right amount of help & tools
- Contains single in-app purchase that can be bought once
- Practice cognitive skills, hand-eye coordination, memory, logical thinking and visual perception. It's a brain teaser.

desc_corta: The story of Snow Princess with educational games for kids 7-9
desc_larga:
This app is about the fairy tale of "Snow Princess", however the plot alternates with a few dozen of educational mini-games for 7-9 year olds. 

You will find new tasks and games with the tale's characters. These fun tasks train logic, memory and attention, for example:
puzzles,
sudoku,
finding a pattern in a sequences of objects,
building a story from a set of pictures,
mazes,
memory game with the gnomes
and other educational games for kids.

The app supports 15 languages: English, Russian, German, French, Spanish, Brazilian Portuguese, Italian, Dutch, Japanese, Swedish, Danish, Norwegian, Polish, Czech and Turkish.

All of our child games have free Android versions.

The fairy tale "Snow Princess" now includes educational tasks and mini-games for kids 7-9 years old. Here you will find not only the story but also fun kids games to train logic, spatial intelligence, memory and attention. Also 12 mini-games are available in a separate list with 4 levels of difficulty (maze, sudoku, puzzles, memory games and other).

We recommend this game for 7, 8 and 9 year olds. It can be used as supplementary material in elementary school. Usually parents and teachers pay more attention to learning numbers, letter and memorizing facts. While generic educational tasks to train basic brain functions (attentions, memory, logic, spatial intelligence) are frequently neglected. However these basic processes are fundamental to successful learning.

desc_corta: Simple and convenient drawing application
desc_larga:
We present you a convenient and simple application for drawing your finger on the screen. The Drawing application has an intuitive interface that can be used by users of any age. We tried to make the application in such a way that the drawing process was as smooth and simple as possible.

In our The Drawing application, the color palette is already preset, and the list is changed with a swipe gesture. We tried to group the colors in such a way that it was quick and convenient to switch between them.

For drawing small details in this version, we have added the function of scaling with two fingers. In addition, the brush size changes in a fairly wide range. And if everything did not go according to plan, the Drawing has a function to undo the last 20 actions and an eraser.

There is also a magic brush that softens the lines, creating a glow effect. Try it, it's very beautiful! Draw and create real masterpieces!

The drawing can be used as a coloring, it has a fill function. Try to draw the outlines of an object or character, turn on the fill mode and let the child paint over. This can be a lot of fun!

And if you have a desire to draw on photos, for example, paint on a mustache or write a beautiful congratulation, then the application has a corresponding function for this: you can take a photo directly from the application, or open it from the gallery on your device.

It's important to keep all your creativity. To do this, we have created a gallery built into the Drawing. All your drawings will be stored there, and at any time they can be opened and completed. And if the drawing is complete, then you can share it with your friends using the corresponding button.

Our application has ads that are displayed only when the drawings are saved. If you like The Drawing, then you can disable ads permanently for a small amount. We are always ready to answer your questions and suggestions at support@softdreams.ru.

desc_corta: A game with fun and beautiful shape puzzles for toddlers and young kids!
desc_larga:
"Peg Puzzle" is one of our fun games for toddlers, with animal shape puzzles for boys and girls. Get set for lots of laughter and fun with beautiful graphics, high-quality sound effects, 9 wildly different backgrounds and many puzzles to solve.

The first puzzle pack with 9 levels is available for free, and if you like the game you can unlock two additional puzzle packs.

In these relaxing and easy puzzles for kids each character is cheerfully animated with multiple cute sound effects. As soon as you place a character your toddler can freely move it around as you like - why not play this educational game together with your toddlers and make up little short stories about all the animals?

With lots of shape puzzles to choose from, which one will become your child's favorite? The farm with cute animals, the Caribbean pirates, the jungle waterhole, the red planet, or the fairytale land with a princess and a dragon? Winter wonderland with Santa Claus and a Christmas tree? Don't forget to try the random level, where your toddler never know what animals you will get. Dinosaurs in the jungle? Aliens in fairy land? Elephants in space? It is simply one of the best games for toddlers.

Parental guidance information:
- Suggested age group is toddlers aged 2 years old, 3 years old or 4 years old, depending on previous touchscreen game experience.
- This toddler learning game encourages basic manipulation skills (drag and drop, touch), problemsolving skills (solving puzzles) and imaginative play (using it as magic stickers).
- Collaborative play is encouraged. After solving a puzzle, take a moment to use the animals in the game as magic stickers and play with your toddler, learning basic spatial concepts or just having fun! How you use it for learning will vary with your kindergarten kids age and abilities.
- Great games for kids with autism of any age - multiple random layouts for each jigsaw puzzle prevents toddlers and children from memorising piece locations.

Check out our other fun games and educational apps for toddlers!

Technical information:
- Installs to SD card if available.
- Anonymous usage statistics are collected via Google Analytics, hence the requirement for Internet access. We do this only to improve the game experience of future versions. The only statistic collected is the number of times each level is played (we take kids privacy seriously)

Music: Kevin MacLeod

desc_corta: Help Kalani become the Island Queen, in this paradise adventure game for girls!
desc_larga:

With the help of the shaman, Princess Kalani‚Äôs spiritual leader, and some special tools, you and Princess Kalani make a great team! Just one thing - get across that ocean fast before Lukela does, or else he‚Äôll be the next island leader instead!

desc_corta: Embark on epic adventures and build your own Gaulish village in Asterix‚Äôs world!
desc_larga:
Welcome to the world of Asterix and his friends. Build your own Gaulish village in Asterix‚Äôs world. EXPLORE ASTERIX‚ÄôS WORLD AND COMPLETE EXCITING QUESTS
